Wamenag Sebut Kelompok Radikal Sebagai Perusuh Agama
03 Nov 2019, 08:45 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Wakil Menteri Agama (Wamenag) Zainut Tauhid Saadi. (CNN Indonesia/ Feri Agus Setyawan)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Wakil Menteri Agama (Wamenag) Zainut Tauhid Saadi menyebut kelompok penganut paham radikal sebagai perusuh agama. Pernyataan Zainut merespons permintaan Presiden Joko Widodo mengganti istilah radikalisme dengan manipulator agama.Zainut menyampaikan apapun istilah yang akan digunakan, kelompok pro kekerasan berbasis ajaran agama tetap harus ditolak. Sebab berpotensi memecah belah kerukunan antarumat beragama."Apapun istilahnya, apakah itu manipulator agama atau perusuh agama, perusuh yang menciptakan situasi yang bisa mencerai beraikan bangsa Indonesia, itu harus kita tolak bersama," kata Zainut saat ditemui pada HUT ke-55 Tahun Parisadha Buddha Dharma Niciren Syosyu Indonesia (NSI) di Kantor Kementerian Agama, Jakarta, Minggu (3/11).Wakil Majelis Ulama Indonesia (MUI) itu menyebut Jokowi mengubah istilah radikalisme karena ingin ajaran agama dijalankan secara benar. Agama, kata dia, hadir untuk mempersatukan, bukan memecah belah.Zainut menilai kerukunan di antara umat beragama merupakan modal yang sangat berharga bagi kelangsungan hidup masyarakat Indonesia.Dia menyampaikan setiap pemuka agama memegang peran penting dalam memerangi radikalisme dengan mendewasakan cara berpikir umat beragama."Agar kerukunan antarumat agama tetap terjaga, perlu kedewasaan berpikir para pemeluk agama masing-masing. Dengan pemahaman moderasi beragama yang komprehensif, umat beragama akan dapat mencegah berkembangnya pemahaman radikalisme, ekstremisme, dan terorisme," ujar dia.Sebelumnya, Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) meminta jajarannya melakukan upaya serius untuk mencegah meluasnya gerakan yang kerap disebut radikalisme. Menurutnya, perlu pula membuat istilah baru guna mencegah penyebaran radikalisme dengan menerapkan label 'manipulator agama'."Atau mungkin enggak tahu, apakah ada istilah lain yang bisa kita gunakan, misalnya manipulator agama," kata Jokowi sampaikan saat membuka rapat terbatas dengan topik Penyampaian Program dan Kegiatan di Bidang Politik, Hukum, dan Keamanan, di Kantor Presiden, Kamis (31/10).(dhf/age)

The Deputy Minister of Religion Calls Radical Groups as Religious Disturbers
03 Nov 2019, 08:45 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Deputy Minister of Religion (Wamenag) Zainut Tauhid Saadi. (CNN Indonesia / Agus Setyawan Ferries)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Deputy Minister of Religion (Wamenag) Zainut Tauhid Saadi called radical groups of followers as religious rioters. Zainut's statement responded to President Joko Widodo's request to replace the term radicalism with a religious manipulator. Zainut conveyed whatever the term would be used, pro-violence groups based on religious teachings must still be rejected. Because it has the potential to divide harmony between religious believers. "Whatever the term is, whether it is a religious manipulator or religious rioters, rioters who create situations that can disintegrate the Indonesian nation, we must reject them together," Zainut said when met at the 55th Anniversary of Parisadha Buddha Dharma Niciren Syosyu Indonesia (NSI) at the Office of the Ministry of Religion, Jakarta, Sunday (3/11). The representative of the Indonesian Ulema Council (MUI) called Jokowi to change the term radicalism because he wanted religious teachings to be carried out correctly. Religion, he said, is here to unite, not divide. Zainut assesses harmony among religious communities is a valuable asset for the survival of the Indonesian people. He said that every religious leader plays an important role in combating radicalism by maturing the way of religious thought. " So that harmony between religious believers is maintained, it is necessary to mature the thinking of the adherents of their respective religions. With a comprehensive understanding of religious moderation, religious communities will be able to prevent the development of understanding of radicalism, extremism and terrorism, "he said. Previously, President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) ask his staff to make serious efforts to prevent the spread of the movement that is often called radicalism. According to him, it is also necessary to come up with a new term to prevent the spread of radicalism by applying the label 'religious manipulator.' and Activities in Politics, Law and Security, at the President's Office, Thursday (10/31). (dhf / age)
